Detector.Details: This detector looks checks if methods annotated with @StaticIndependent do not read or write static state, that is, static variables which are not final and immutable (like a String or Integer). Any methods called from a @StaticIndependent method are also implicitly assumed to be annotated, and thus, checked for static access.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: A method accesses static state, while it is not allowed to
BugPattern.LongDescription: Method {1} accesses static variable {2}, while it is not allowed to
BugPattern.Details: This method is annotated with @StaticIndependent (or is implicitly annotated as it is called from an annotated method), and it attempts to read or write a static variable, which isn't final and immutable.
